pages.text: Integral augments improve the overall stats of machines, devices, dynamos, and tools; they scale the base RF storage, RF transfer, fluid storage, and energy usage/generation. This overall scale factor stacks with other augment modifiers, even if they are in bold. However, as with all other modifiers in bold, only the highest scale factor modifier applies.

For example, a $(l:thermal:technology/machines/furnace)redstone furnace$(/l) with resonant and hardened integral components and a $(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)stabilized RF coil$(/l) will have 24x the RF storage, 8x the RF transfer, and 4x the energy usage.$(br2)Hardened, reinforced, and resonant integral components have scale factors of 2x, 3x, and 4x respectively.
